title: Is this sub still active?
content: just wanted to know. CS Student from ECC here (batch of 24), how's everyone doing :D

comments.body: Hey there! I'm also a CS student from EC campus ! Which section are you in?
I'm in H section! As far as the sub goes there haven't been many posts on it.. there just  aren't many people in this sub
Maybe we can try and get this sub active?
Sure! share the link on the discord and all?
